overview: Everyone loves the heat of the summer and the chance to get outdoors to enjoy the sunshine, but that doesn't mean that the winter doesn't have its benefits too. Playing in the ice and snow, snuggling up with a loved one in front of an open fire, supping hot chocolate - and, of course, in the case of the ever-horny Staxus lads, sucking and fucking each other senseless. Studio favourites Noah Matous, Alessandro Katz and Bjorn Nykvsit lead sexy new boys, Will Banks and Jack Ganley, to a veritable winter wonderland of hard cock and sweet raw arse. The result is a blizzard of spunk that has to be seen to be believed.
title: Snow Blind
